dialogue.name: Maya Is Confusion
text: Hi! Um. I'm Maya. Very happy to meet you!

choices.text: So... can I ask about your nips? Why does a tree lady need nipples? And kinda moreover, why boobs?

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Free Them
text: Through them you may suckle the essence of molten Desire. Is this your wish? As for my enlarged breasts, well they're just lovely.

dialogue.name: Maya Stranger Danger
text: cool, cool. Uh, maybe when we know each other a little better. They certainly are lovely... *ahem* ANyway...
